Plot: Inspired by true events: A brokenhearted young man begins to abuse antidepressants in an effort to cope with the split from his longtime girlfriend.
Title: Schism
Writer: Justin Taite, Justin Taite (original story), Jonathan Hirschbein (original story), Jonathan Hirschbein (story), Justin Taite (story), Justin Taite
Actors: Rachael Markarian, Danny Araujo, Justin Taite, Nick Finch
